product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Chili Mac - Single Serving
long_description: You can satisfy the hungriest of campers and hikers with this crowd-pleasing mix of beans, cheeses and pasta. Made with all-natural, organic ingredients. Just add boiling water, stir and let stand in pouch before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. All flavors may contain nuts, seeds or nut/seed residue as well as trace amounts of dairy.
short_description: You can satisfy the hungriest of campers and hikers with this crowd-pleasing mix of beans, cheeses and pasta.
